member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.GetUserInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets user information including diary IDs for the specified email address
member.param: Authentication cookie
User's email address
member.returns: UserInfo object with diary IDs, or null if not found

member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.GetDiaryData(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets diary data for a specific user, date, and program
member.param: Authentication cookie
Diary ID (PerformanceDiaryId or WellnessDiaryId)
Date in yyyy-MM-dd format
User ID (not email)
Program ID
Week number (0-based)
Day number (1-7)
Session number (usually 0)
Session index (usually 0)

member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.GetDiaryDataByEmail(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convenience method to get diary data by email address
member.param: Authentication cookie
User's email address
Date in yyyy-MM-dd format
Program ID
Week number (0-based)
Day number (1-7)
Type of diary: "performance" or "wellness"
Session number (usually 0)
Session index (usually 0)

member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.ParseDiaryData(System.String)
member.summary: Parse diary JSON into a more usable format
member.param: Raw JSON from GetDiaryData

member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.GetDiaryTemplate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get diary form template/structure for a specific diary
member.param: Authentication cookie
Diary ID

member.name: M:SportsTraining.Services.VisualCoachingService.ParseDiaryTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Parse diary template into a structured form
member.param: Template JSON from GetDiaryTemplate

member.name: T:SportsTraining.Resource
member.summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ColorAnimationExtensions_Button.TextColorTo(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,Microsoft.Maui.Easing,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Animates the TextColor of an to the given color
member.param: The target color to animate the to
The time, in milliseconds, between the frames of the animation
The duration, in milliseconds, of the animation
The easing function to be used in the animation
member.returns: Value indicating if the animation completed successfully or not
